subproject.corporate outcome: Livelihoods and economic recovery generated, including infrastructure restoration, employment and sustainable income earning opportunities for crisis affected communities
subproject.description: The proposed workplan for 2010 focuses in improving capacity for post-conflict employment creation; more inclusive post-conflict economic recovery for the achievement of the MDGs in CPRs Cos;  joint initiatives with the UN Global Compact Office on responsible investment practices in CPR Cos.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Post-Conflict Economic Recover
